forum.content:
The story from the have TED standards pastor
in the pulpit .

Ou Siting priest said:

"Perhaps you are now rejected,
but a good thing is coming,
You will recover,
you'll promotion.

Please tell yourself:
I don't want to be rejected trapped,
I want to embrace the future. "

有TED水準的牧師在佈道台上說故事

歐斯汀牧師表示：
「 或許你現在被否決，
可是好事就要來臨了，你會康復，你會升遷。

請告訴自己：
我不要被拒絕困住，我要迎接未來.」


Whatever luv or anything,
Nothing let to say.
Just do it.
至少沒有遺憾，對吧？
forum.title: 好吧，俺承認看到幾篇英文梗，手癢罷了
